name: Laser Focus (chavalo)
description:
Yet another MAD Game Jam game. I made the art for this one. José Felgueiras, André Cavaleiro e Sergio Junior all worked on the code. Sergio also helped a lot on Testing and Game Design.

This is a twist on laser puzzles, where you have to reflect the laser onto the other player's master piece (the ones on the corners). The game is played by turns and you must place pieces in order to reflect or block the laser.

Use Xbox One controllers or a remapping software.

  • Left Joystick - Move around the board
  • Right Joystick - Cycle through the pieces
  • A - Place pieces
